tasks.task: Weed management in strawberry farming in Florida.
subtasks: Apply fumigants (e.g., picloram, Tellone C35) before planting.
Use pre-emergent herbicides under plastic mulch.
Manage weed resurgence with post-emergent herbicides.
Implement cover crops during fallow periods.
Monitor and maintain integrated weed management.
